name: Season's Beatings (itch) (KingCone)
description: You play as a Black Friday shopper that wants to buy as many items as possible. There are other shoppers that will attempt to beat you up and take your items. The player can find weapons such as baseballs bat, frying pans and guns. The goal is to collect as many items as possible and make it to the checkout counter alive. The game functions similar top down action games.
